structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The board of regents for the Kentucky Community and Technical College System shall establish a personnel dispute resolution system that results, in the final stage, in an independent third party appeal for all employees of the Kentucky Community and Technical College System.
law.history: Created 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 20, effective May 30, 1997.
